title: Sated?
body:
When should I have sated devourer?
20 minutes feels too slow for me, but I see all the noobs at my ELO getting it at ~25 minutes...

Also, should I be starting knife or other thingy when using {{champion:131}} (with and without attack speed runes)?

replies.body: pre-20 is the goal. 16-17 is ok. If you grab a couple early kills (and a dragon) you can get sated by like 12 minutes
Sorry mate, but 12mins is unrealistic, especially now that rift herald only gives 2 stacks.

can still be done.

Double kill at ~3 min with 4 camps cleared ~3:30 min you can buy it, the if you get every camp when it rises and drag and herald and all crabs and kills in ganks you can get after 10 min of game

I'm sorry but no, that is extremely unrealistic. In 90% of games you won't get devourer alone until about 7 minutes, and from there only junglers such as Udyr can get it by 15 minutes, most others get it by 18 minutes

Ok let me clear it for you, you lots of kills really early, really fed now. pretty much straight up got dev and boots. run run run clearing killign every1 you come by in under 3 sec, got mobies and around 3 lvs ahead of enemy teams highest lv, have complete domination of everything, so every single jg camps and every enemy champ is yours to kill, if you perfectly clear everything and do it right you can scrape by with sated at ~12:15 min which is around 10 min of play.

And how often do you get to that point? You aren't always going to snowball and even if you do you aren't going to be able to kill anyone in under 3 seconds if you're going devourer cause you have literally no damage until sated. Sure in lower elos where it is much more chaotic it might be possible to get it earlier, but when you get higher it is near impossible to get sated before 15 minutes, which isn't even slow...

you're an idiot aren't you. It was about being possible and it is. And you can kill people under 3 sec even with dev if you are really fed. The question was if it was possible and it is, and i gave the reasons it was. I never said it happens every game, the closest you would get to every game is a shaco who kills their jg whenever they walk into the jg. Im saying that its possible if a scenario goes right for you, say they do a 4 man invade and you kill all 4, that would leave you enough to get dev after a buff camp, or by selling your pots and waiting 20-15 sec. Then because of your massive gold and xp lead you can counter jg and just kill and kill their jg getting stacks ad more fed and easily getting mobies(with alacrity), and taking all their jg, you have complete dominance over all stacks, easy clearing to 30 within the remaining 8 min..
I don't think you're getting the point. That. Doesn't. Happen. Who cares if it is possible or not if it is never going to happen. Be realistic...

No, you are not getting the point, the question was the shortest time it **could** happen, and 12 min (10 without the 2 min pregame time) is the shortest time. Im not saying its possible every game, hell i know its only like a 1/1000 chance, im just saying that it** CAN BE DONE**.

12 minutes is godly, Thats a game where you probably got a triple kill at dragon getting you 3 stacks + 5 + 2 from scuttle
16 minutes is good
20 minutes is bad
25+  minutes you're probably going to lose this game 

But the real factor to look at is how good the enemy jungler is doing...What's their farm/kills/level
Roughly 13 minutes by farming each camp killing scutter ganking securing early dragons and taking herald. (give the buff to laning allies as it helps them more)
